pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing AOU SDOH Survey Data // Functions for processing and analyzing survey data from the All of Us Social Determinants of Health (AOUSDOH) program, including tools for calculating health and well-being scores, recoding variables, and simplifying survey data analysis. For more details see - Koleck TA, Dreisbach C, Zhang C, Grayson S, Lor M, Deng Z, Conway A, Higgins PDR, Bakken S (2024) doi:10.1093/jamia/ocae214.
